Sheet.name: R1-CHEM
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.rType,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,ifnull(a.total,0)+ifnull(o.outTotal,0)-ifnull(i.inTotal,0) opening, ifnull(i.inVendor,0) inVendor,ifnull(i.inCharges,0) inCharges,ifnull(i.inInterlab,0) inInterlab,ifnull(i.inSponsor,0) inSponsor, ifnull(i.inTotal,0) inTotal, ifnull(o.outDiscard,0) outDiscard,ifnull(o.outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,ifnull(o.outOther,0) outOther,ifnull(o.outSponsor,0) outSponsor,ifnull(o.outTrialTest,0) outTrialTest,ifnull(o.outValidation,0) outValidation,ifnull(o.outTotal,0) outTotal,ifnull(a.total,0) closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,ifnull(p.localprice,0) localprice,ifnull(a.total*p.localprice,0) totalAmount,null as remark, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyIn,ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, ifnull(q.asqtyin,0) pqtyIn,ifnull(q.asqtyout,0) pqtyOut, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyin,0),0) cqtyIn, ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyout,0),0) cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType =1 order by a.orderno asc

Sheet.name: R2-LCMS_Micro
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.rType,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,ifnull(a.total,0)+ifnull(o.outTotal,0)-ifnull(i.inTotal,0) opening, ifnull(i.inVendor,0) inVendor,ifnull(i.inCharges,0) inCharges,ifnull(i.inInterlab,0) inInterlab,ifnull(i.inSponsor,0) inSponsor, ifnull(i.inTotal,0) inTotal, ifnull(o.outDiscard,0) outDiscard,ifnull(o.outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,ifnull(o.outOther,0) outOther,ifnull(o.outSponsor,0) outSponsor,ifnull(o.outTrialTest,0) outTrialTest,ifnull(o.outValidation,0) outValidation,ifnull(o.outTotal,0) outTotal,ifnull(a.total,0) closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,ifnull(p.localprice,0) localprice,ifnull(a.total*p.localprice,0) totalAmount,null as remark, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyIn,ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, ifnull(q.asqtyin,0) pqtyIn,ifnull(q.asqtyout,0) pqtyOut, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyin,0),0) cqtyIn, ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyout,0),0) cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType =2 order by a.orderno asc

Sheet.name: R3-Hema_Flow
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.rType,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,ifnull(a.total,0)+ifnull(o.outTotal,0)-ifnull(i.inTotal,0) opening, ifnull(i.inVendor,0) inVendor,ifnull(i.inCharges,0) inCharges,ifnull(i.inInterlab,0) inInterlab,ifnull(i.inSponsor,0) inSponsor, ifnull(i.inTotal,0) inTotal, ifnull(o.outDiscard,0) outDiscard,ifnull(o.outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,ifnull(o.outOther,0) outOther,ifnull(o.outSponsor,0) outSponsor,ifnull(o.outTrialTest,0) outTrialTest,ifnull(o.outValidation,0) outValidation,ifnull(o.outTotal,0) outTotal,ifnull(a.total,0) closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,ifnull(p.localprice,0) localprice,ifnull(a.total*p.localprice,0) totalAmount,null as remark, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyIn,ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, ifnull(q.asqtyin,0) pqtyIn,ifnull(q.asqtyout,0) pqtyOut, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyin,0),0) cqtyIn, ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyout,0),0) cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType = 3 order by a.orderno asc

Sheet.name: R4-Variant
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.rType,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,ifnull(a.total,0)+ifnull(o.outTotal,0)-ifnull(i.inTotal,0) opening, ifnull(i.inVendor,0) inVendor,ifnull(i.inCharges,0) inCharges,ifnull(i.inInterlab,0) inInterlab,ifnull(i.inSponsor,0) inSponsor, ifnull(i.inTotal,0) inTotal, ifnull(o.outDiscard,0) outDiscard,ifnull(o.outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,ifnull(o.outOther,0) outOther,ifnull(o.outSponsor,0) outSponsor,ifnull(o.outTrialTest,0) outTrialTest,ifnull(o.outValidation,0) outValidation,ifnull(o.outTotal,0) outTotal,ifnull(a.total,0) closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,ifnull(p.localprice,0) localprice,ifnull(a.total*p.localprice,0) totalAmount,null as remark, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyIn,ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, ifnull(q.asqtyin,0) pqtyIn,ifnull(q.asqtyout,0) pqtyOut, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyin,0),0) cqtyIn, ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyout,0),0) cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType = 4 order by a.orderno asc

AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType = 6 order by a.orderno asc

Sheet.name: R7-Urine
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.rType,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,ifnull(a.total,0)+ifnull(o.outTotal,0)-ifnull(i.inTotal,0) opening, ifnull(i.inVendor,0) inVendor,ifnull(i.inCharges,0) inCharges,ifnull(i.inInterlab,0) inInterlab,ifnull(i.inSponsor,0) inSponsor, ifnull(i.inTotal,0) inTotal, ifnull(o.outDiscard,0) outDiscard,ifnull(o.outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,ifnull(o.outOther,0) outOther,ifnull(o.outSponsor,0) outSponsor,ifnull(o.outTrialTest,0) outTrialTest,ifnull(o.outValidation,0) outValidation,ifnull(o.outTotal,0) outTotal,ifnull(a.total,0) closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,ifnull(p.localprice,0) localprice,ifnull(a.total*p.localprice,0) totalAmount,null as remark, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyIn,ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, ifnull(q.asqtyin,0) pqtyIn,ifnull(q.asqtyout,0) pqtyOut, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyin,0),0) cqtyIn, ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyout,0),0) cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType = 7 order by a.orderno asc

AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType = 9 order by a.orderno asc

Sheet.name: Lab_Gen_Supplier
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.rType,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,null as machineNo,null as machineName,ifnull(a.total,0)+ifnull(o.outTotal,0)-ifnull(i.inTotal,0) opening, ifnull(i.inVendor,0) inVendor,ifnull(i.inCharges,0) inCharges,ifnull(i.inInterlab,0) inInterlab,ifnull(i.inSponsor,0) inSponsor, ifnull(i.inTotal,0) inTotal, ifnull(o.outDiscard,0) outDiscard,ifnull(o.outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,ifnull(o.outOther,0) outOther,ifnull(o.outSponsor,0) outSponsor,ifnull(o.outTrialTest,0) outTrialTest,ifnull(o.outValidation,0) outValidation,ifnull(o.outTotal,0) outTotal,ifnull(a.total,0) closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,ifnull(p.localprice,0) localprice,ifnull(a.total*p.localprice,0) totalAmount,null as remark, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyIn,ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, ifnull(q.asqtyin,0) pqtyIn,ifnull(q.asqtyout,0) pqtyOut, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyin,0),0) cqtyIn, ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyout,0),0) cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType = 20 order by a.orderno asc

Sheet.name: CTM_Suppliers_DTW
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.rType,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,ifnull(a.total,0)+ifnull(o.outTotal,0)-ifnull(i.inTotal,0) opening, ifnull(i.inVendor,0) inVendor,ifnull(i.inCharges,0) inCharges,ifnull(i.inInterlab,0) inInterlab,ifnull(i.inSponsor,0) inSponsor, ifnull(i.inTotal,0) inTotal, ifnull(o.outDiscard,0) outDiscard,ifnull(o.outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,ifnull(o.outOther,0) outOther,ifnull(o.outSponsor,0) outSponsor,ifnull(o.outTrialTest,0) outTrialTest,ifnull(o.outValidation,0) outValidation,ifnull(o.outTotal,0) outTotal,ifnull(a.total,0) closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,ifnull(p.localprice,0) localprice,ifnull(a.total*p.localprice,0) totalAmount,null as remark, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyIn,ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, ifnull(q.asqtyin,0) pqtyIn,ifnull(q.asqtyout,0) pqtyOut, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyin,0),0) cqtyIn, ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyout,0),0) cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where a.rType =11 order by a.orderno asc

Sheet.name: Discard_CLab
Sheet.sql: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,t.* from( select @rownum:=0 ,b.id,a.outDate,a.description,a.catno, a.price,getCodeName('money',a.priceUnit) currency, b.expiredate,a.num qty,a.num*a.price totalAmnt,a.cause as rootCause,a.section, b.producer,b.dealer,getCodeName('catfrom',b.catfrom) as catFrom from b_out a,b_cat b where a.catno=b.catno and a.batchno=b.batchno and a.price=b.price and (a.rType between 1 and 9) and a.reason='2' and a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY a.outDate ASC )t

Sheet.name: Validation_CLab
Sheet.sql: select t.id,t.section, t.outDate,t.description,t.rType,t.catname,t.qty,t.priceCNY, t.priceCNY*t.qty totalCostCNY,t.priceUSD*t.qty totalCostUSD,t.projectCode from( select b.id,a.machineName section,a.outDate,a.description,getCodeName('rtype',b.rType) rType,a.catname,a.num qty, round(getMoney(a.priceUnit,a.price,'0'),2) priceCNY,round(getMoney(a.priceUnit,a.price,'1'),2) priceUSD,a.projectCode from b_out a,b_cat b where a.catno=b.catno and a.batchno=b.batchno and a.price=b.price and (a.rType between 1 and 9) and a.reason='1' and a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY a.outDate ASC ) t

Sheet.name: R10-Oncology
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.rType,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,ifnull(a.total,0)+ifnull(o.outTotal,0)-ifnull(i.inTotal,0) opening, ifnull(i.inVendor,0) inVendor,ifnull(i.inCharges,0) inCharges,ifnull(i.inInterlab,0) inInterlab,ifnull(i.inSponsor,0) inSponsor, ifnull(i.inTotal,0) inTotal, ifnull(o.outDiscard,0) outDiscard,ifnull(o.outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,ifnull(o.outOther,0) outOther,ifnull(o.outSponsor,0) outSponsor,ifnull(o.outTrialTest,0) outTrialTest,ifnull(o.outValidation,0) outValidation,ifnull(o.outTotal,0) outTotal,ifnull(a.total,0) closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,ifnull(p.localprice,0) localprice,ifnull(a.total*p.localprice,0) totalAmount,null as remark, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyIn,ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice,0) qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, ifnull(q.asqtyin,0) pqtyIn,ifnull(q.asqtyout,0) pqtyOut, ifnull(i.inTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyin,0),0) cqtyIn, ifnull(o.outTotal*p.localprice+ifnull(q.asqtyout,0),0) cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY vin.catid )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(outOther) outOther, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(outOther)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.catid )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid LEFT JOIN r_qty_view q ON a.id=q.catid where (a.rType=10) order by a.orderno asc

Sheet.name: Discard_APLab
Sheet.sql: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,t.* from( select @rownum:=0 ,b.id,a.outDate,a.description,a.catno, a.price,getCodeName('money',a.priceUnit) currency, b.expiredate,a.num qty,a.num*a.price totalAmnt,a.cause as rootCause,a.section, b.producer,b.dealer,getCodeName('catfrom',b.catfrom) as catFrom from b_out a,b_cat b where a.catno=b.catno and a.batchno=b.batchno and a.price=b.price and (a.rType=10) and a.reason='2' and a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY a.outDate ASC )t

Sheet.name: Validation_APLab
Sheet.sql: select t.id,t.section, t.outDate,t.description,t.rType,t.catname,t.qty,t.priceCNY, t.priceCNY*t.qty totalCostCNY,t.priceUSD*t.qty totalCostUSD,t.projectCode from( select b.id,a.machineName section,a.outDate,a.description,getCodeName('rtype',b.rType) rType,a.catname,a.num qty, round(getMoney(a.priceUnit,a.price,'0'),2) priceCNY,round(getMoney(a.priceUnit,a.price,'1'),2) priceUSD,a.projectCode from b_out a,b_cat b where a.catno=b.catno and a.batchno=b.batchno and a.price=b.price and (a.rType=10) and a.reason='1' and a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY a.outDate ASC ) t
